scroll_to_top.label: Scroll to top
scroll_to_top.help: Show a button to scroll to the top of the page

icon.label: Icon Scroll to top
icon.help: Customize the icon of the button. Leave blank to use the default icon.

scroll_to_bottom.label: Scroll to bottom
scroll_to_bottom.help: Show a button to scroll to the bottom of the page

icon.label: Icon Scroll to bottom
icon.help: Customize the icon of the button. Leave blank to use the default icon.
